metadata.name: Bookmarklets Wiki
metadata.description: A curated collection of useful and fun bookmarklets to enhance your Browse experience.
metadata.author: Mina Nageh

categories.name: Productivity & Utilities
categories.description: Bookmarklets to help you be more efficient and perform common tasks.

bookmarklets.name: Facebook Video Downloader
bookmarklets.description: Download videos from Facebook with different quality options, resolution, and file size information.
bookmarklets.note: If no video is found, click the play button on the video first, then run the bookmarklet again.

bookmarklets.name: Custom YouTube Video Player + Downloader
bookmarklets.description: Allows full control of YouTube videos, including downloading and more.

bookmarklets.name: Facebook Comments Expander
bookmarklets.description: Expands all 'view more comments' and 'show replies' on Facebook posts. Great for searching in comments (Ctrl + F).

bookmarklets.name: PayWall Remover
bookmarklets.description: Removes paywalls from websites using multiple sources from removepaywall.com.

bookmarklets.name: Medium PayWall Remover
bookmarklets.description: Bypasses 'Members only' articles on Medium by using freedium.cfd.

categories.name: Developer Tools
categories.description: Bookmarklets useful for web developers, designers, and anyone inspecting web pages.

bookmarklets.name: Neat Local Storage Exporter
bookmarklets.description: Exports and imports localStorage of a selected domain without manual copying.

bookmarklets.name: Toggle Password Visibility
bookmarklets.description: Shows or hides all password fields on the page withÂ eachÂ click. for sites that don't have the option.
